content: Operating income in the Industrial Assets Division was $3.3 million in the second quarter of 2022, a significant increase as compared to $433,000 in the second quarter of 2021. In our Financial Assets Division, we saw growth of 156% to $1.2 million in operating income compared to $462,000 in the second quarter of 2021., Net income was $2.6 million or $0.07 per basic and diluted share compared to net income of $587,000 or $0.02 per basic and diluted share in the second quarter of 2021.
